name: Mordakhesh
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren\'t silvered
book: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.Limited Magic Immunity: Mordakhesh can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless he wishes to be. Mordakhesh has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

actions.Greatsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d10 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) force damage.
actions.Chromatic Orb: Ranged Spell Attack: +10+1d10 + 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d8) damage of a type chosen by Mordakhesh: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

options.Attack: Mordakhesh makes one weapon attack or casts chromatic orb.
